matches.reasoning: The bank entry for 'Honey Inc. E-Trans' on 01/01/2025 matches the GL entry for 'Honey Inc. received 50 units of robot' with the same amount of 1050. The date and description closely align.
The bank entry for 'Bee Inc. E-Trans' on 02/01/2025 matches the GL entry for 'Bee Inc. got our robot(Invoice 1110)' with the same amount of 1100. The date and description closely align.

The bank entry for 'Goodies Inc. E-Trans' on 07/01/2025 matches the GL entry for 'Goodies Inc. paid a portion for 100 bots (1111)' with the same amount of 2000. The date is close and the description matches the vendor name.

The bank entry for 'Baddies Wire' on 08/01/2025 matches the GL entry for 'Baddies Inc. paid for 40 bots(1112)' with the same amount of 2000. The date is close and the description matches the vendor name.

The bank entry for 'Goodies Inc. E-Trans' on 09/01/2025 matches the GL entry for 'Goodies Inc. paid for the remaining money of their 100 bots received(1111)' with the same amount of 3000. The date is close and the description matches the vendor name.

The bank entry for 'Kings Inc. E-Trans' on 01/13/2025 does not have a direct match in the GL entries. The closest GL entry is for 'Kings Inc. need to pay for 20 bots(1114)' but the amounts do not match. This could be a partial payment or a different transaction.

The bank entry for 'K-Foods. E-Trans' on 01/13/2025 with a negative amount does not have a corresponding GL entry. This could be a refund or an error, but without more information, a match cannot be confidently made.
